pullRequest.title: Duplicate literals
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change
As suggested by sonar:

duplicate literals have extracted into constants.
variable declaration made explicit in javascript file

commit.message: first lot of string literals extracted as constants
more string literals converted to constants
more string literals converted to constants

nodes.bodyText: It feels excessive turning number formatters into constants...
Perhaps make this "The requested ScoreType, %s, is not supported." and use a string formatter?
Although the string is the same, this use of CONTENT is different to above, i'd keep these separate to highlight that point.

I don't think the setFormat function actually works (a bug), but perhaps use the default Constellation format over this random format here, and move all the setFormat's to new lines to make it clear they are there.
This could actually be moved into AbstractTableTranslator.UnrecognisedColumnException.
Why a constant for visibility here, but not x, y, z, ...?
This seems like a poor id value.
...especially since it's used all over the place.
Is fatal supposed to be all caps?
Maybe "~Node ", to be consistent with sphere graph?
